============================
Profile : XiNiX™ InfoTech Pvt. Ltd. :
============================
XiNiX™ InfoTech Pvt. Ltd.® is an industry leader providing a wide array of Web Hosting Solutions and services tailored to meet the requirements of Individuals & new millennium Enterprises. XiNiX™ InfoTech Pvt. Ltd. is a Registered Company ( Company ID : 45546 ) which specializes in Web Hosting, Server Solution, Managed Services VPS and E-mail Services. Our business is focused on keeping our technical support and customer service strong. Year by year we have continued to build and strengthen our company.

With so much overselling and playing with bandwidth and hardware quality in the industry these days, it's hard to find a dedicated and reputable hosting provider. We pride ourselves on providing unmatched support services and that's what our clients value about us.

============================
XiNiX™ : COMPANY HIGHLIGHTS :
============================
  • 12+ Years in Business. We are a Reliable Entity with Proven Track Record.
  • Full Value of Money with our Exclusive Offers & Unmatched Pricing
  • 24x7 Rapid Support. Initial Reply : 30 Minutes ( Usually Under 5 Minutes ) , Resolution Time : 1 Hour.
  • Unmetered 100 Mbps and 1 Gbps Network Available
  • Word class SLAs with Free Hardware Replacement within 4 Hours
  • NO Setup FEE of ANY Kind , NO Hidden Fees , Fixed Prices on a Month-to-Month Basis
  • Our Website : http://www.xinix.us
  • Client Portal & Support : https://core.xinix.net
  • Our Other Global Websites - US : https://www.xinix.us | EU : http://www.xinix.co | IN : https://www.xinix.in
============================
XiNiX™ : Service Level Agreement :
============================
Your website and applications are essential when it comes to the success of your business. At XiNiX we know that if your network or servers are down, you are losing revenue and opportunities. Though a very rare occasion, but if we do fail we have you covered.
  • We offer 99.95% Uptime Gurantee.
  • If we ever fall short, You get 20% of your monthly hosting fee back for each 20 minutes of downtime.
  • If downtime exceeds 20 minutes in a particular month, You may request a credit of 20% of your monthly hosting fee for each 20 minutes of downtime, up to a maximum credit of 100% of your monthly hosting fee.
